text: Zenaida Alexandrovna von Minkwitz (Зинаида Александровна фон Минквиц) (1878-1918), was a Russian botanist noted for her study of the flora of Khazakstan. ==References== Category:1878 births Category:1918 deaths Category:Women botanists Category:Russian women scientists
title: Zenaida Alexandrovna Minkwitz
